item.title: A whale spent $5.02 million to accumulate 13.73 million TRX coins
item.description: August 25th. As per the monitoring of LookOnChain, the whale address commencing with TNQsyU allocated 5.02 million USDT yesterday and purchased 13.73 million TRX.Previously, the "TWfFe1" starting Smart Money address, which had achieved a profit of $277,000 through trading TRX, spent $500,000 one hour ago and bought 1.414 million TRX.

item.title: Grayscale Files Avalanche ETF's S-1 Application with the SEC
item.description: On August 25th, according to market information, Grayscale has submitted the S-1 application document for an Avalanche Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF) to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

item.title: Whales and smart money are buying $TRX!
item.description: Whales and smart money are buying $TRX! Whale "TNQsyU" spent 5.02M $USDT to buy 13.73M $TRX yesterday. Smart trader "TWfFe1" who made $277K trading $TRX before, spent $500K to buy 1.414M $TRX an hour ago.

item.title: Public Blockchain Activity Rank in the Last 7 Days: Solana Holds the Top Position
item.description: On August 25th, according to Nansen data, the top five public chains in terms of active addresses within the past 7 days are as follows: Solana (21.82 million), BNB Chain (10.90 million), Tron (6.66 million), Base (6.52 million), and Sei (4.96 million).

item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin Pulls Back to Pre-Powell Speech Levels, Technical Outlook Favors Bearish Trend
item.description: On August 25th, CoinDesk analyst and Chartered Market Technician Omkar Godbole declared that the price of Bitcoin (BTC) has pulled back to approximately $112,000, nearing the level prior to the dovish remarks made by Federal Reserve Chair Powell last Friday. The high last week reached $117,440.The daily chart indicates that Bitcoin has formed a "lower high" near the uptrend line extended from the April low, confirming the break of the previous trendline, suggesting that the bearish trend may persist. The Guppy Multiple Moving Average short-term average is on the verge of crossing below the long-term average, also signifying an increase in bearish momentum.The key support level for Bitcoin is at $110,756, with additional support near the 200-day moving average around $100,000. In order to restore the bullish outlook, the price needs to rebound above last Friday's high of $117,440.

item.title: Binance Futures will launch SOMIUSDT USDT perpetual contract pre-market trading
item.description: August 25th. According to an official announcement, the Binance Futures platform will initiate SOM/USDT perpetual contract trading at 17:30 on August 25th, 2025 (in UTC+8 time zone). Pre-market trading will be available with a leverage of up to 5 times.

item.title: A whale has deposited 10.98 million USDC into Hyperliquid to leverage 3x and go long on XPL.
item.description: On August 25th, as monitored by LookOnChain, a whale deposited 10.98 million USDC into Hyperliquid to take a 3x long position on XPL. Currently, their position holds 161,700 XPL (valued at $8.76 million), and has an unrealized loss of $519,000.

item.title: Vanadi Coffee has once again increased its Bitcoin holdings by 5 coins, bringing the total holdings to 100 coins.
item.description: On August 25th, as per NLNico's monitoring, the Spanish coffee chain Vanadi Coffee once more increased its holdings by 5 bitcoins, resulting in its total holdings reaching 100 bitcoins.

item.title: Trump will sign an executive order on Monday
item.description: On August 25th, as per AXIOS, President Trump of the United States is scheduled to sign an executive order on Monday.

item.title: Analyst: Ethereum's Short-Term Performance May Still Outperform Bitcoin
item.description: August 25th. The CryptoQuant analyst CryptoMe noted that recently, Ethereum has demonstrated a more robust trend compared to BTC. The rise in CME open interest and the fact that retail investors have not yet participated suggest that this disparity may persist in the short to medium term.
